import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Contact = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', subject: '', message: '' }); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Handle form submission here console.log('Form submitted:', formData); alert('Pesan berhasil dikirim! Kami akan menghubungi Anda segera.'); setFormData({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', subject: '', message: '' }); }; const contactInfo = [ { icon: "üìû", title: "Telepon", details: "+62 21 1234 5678", description: "Senin - Minggu, 24 Jam" }, { icon: "‚úâÔ∏è", title: "Email", details: "hello@rentcar.com", description: "Kami akan balas dalam 2 jam" }, { icon: "üìç", title: "Kantor Pusat", details: "Jl. Sudirman No. 123", description: "Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia" }, { icon: "üïí", title: "Jam Operasional", details: "24/7 Setiap Hari", description: "Termasuk hari libur nasional" } ]; return (
